Text: Thanks very much for this... brings back lots of memories - all cherished ones, listening to my aunts play many of these great tracks for me, which got me hooked on great, rockin' music at a very young age!
Thanks! To save some drive space, I converted these to 160kbps VBR; those interested can find that over here: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7156470 .
